snippet: FIFA’s disciplinary committee rejected a request by Brazil’s soccer federation to punish the Colombian player whose tackle knocked Brazil’s top player, Neymar, out of the World Cup.
abstract: FIFA's disciplinary committee rejects request by Brazil's soccer federation to punish Juan Camilo Zuniga, Colombian player whose tackle of Brazilian star Neymar knocked him out of World Cup.
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s disciplinary committee rejected a request by Brazil’s soccer federation to punish the Colombian player whose tackle knocked Brazil’s top player, Neymar, out of the World Cup.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: FIFA Won’t Act on Neymar Hit Due to Referee’s Ruling
